channel.title: Problem with SCAR... different from Jme's problem
channel.description: Well when I run a script, the mouse just sits there and does nothing. I have silent mouse off and all the settings right. Unlike Jme's problem, it doesn't lag. It also finds the colors. But it won't move the mouse.

item.title: Problem with SCAR... different from Jme's problem
item.dc:creator: @bullzeye95 bullzeye
item.description:
@bullzeye95 wrote:

I figured out the problem. I don’t have the right version of SRL. I only have 1 plugin but I need 3.

Read full topic
item.source: Problem with SCAR... different from Jme's problem

item.title: Problem with SCAR... different from Jme's problem
item.dc:creator: @roberty_bob roberty bob
item.description:
@roberty_bob wrote:

to figure out where it is getting stuck go to SCAR’s drop down menu and use the step into/step over or “run to cursor” options instead pressing “run” on the script like usual. this will show where it is getting stuck.

Read full topic
item.source: Problem with SCAR... different from Jme's problem

item.title: Problem with SCAR... different from Jme's problem
item.dc:creator: @bullzeye95 bullzeye
item.description:
@bullzeye95 wrote:

I don’t know the loop it’s getting stuck on. And yea SRL is properly installed. It’s also compiling. I’m at my friend’s house now though.

Oh and thanks about the sig. If you want to think of one like that, try smoking crack, that helps.

Read full topic
item.source: Problem with SCAR... different from Jme's problem

item.title: Problem with SCAR... different from Jme's problem
item.dc:creator: @roberty_bob roberty bob
item.description:
@roberty_bob wrote:

like your sig man.

you really have to give more detail for me to be able to help.

I’m assuming you have downloaded SRL and so on, your script is compiling fine etc.?

Try stepping through the script instead of running it… and paste the loop it is getting stuck inside to this thread.

Read full topic

item.title: Problem with SCAR... different from Jme's problem
item.dc:creator: @bullzeye95 bullzeye
item.description:
@bullzeye95 wrote:

Well I found out that it’s just the SRL scripts. It was working last night, but it won’t work today.
